data.name: Fairground Power Polyp Simulator
data.detailed_description:
Always dreamed to be the operator of your favorite fairground ride? This is your change to take the control! Our Polyp Simulator will let you operate the ride completely yourself in a realistic way. It will work the same way as it does in real life.

This simulator will give you full control on the ride. You'll be able to do the same as in real life since the control panel and the way the ride works, are the same as the real deal.

Ride features
  • Control the gondolas
  • Control the main engine speed
  • Control the crosses speeds
  • Turn both the compressor and electronic motor on or off
  • Control the excenter
  • Control the lift

Environment features
  • Time slider for day/night
  • During night the buildings will turn on their interior lights

What else?
  • Give it your own touch by enabling or disabling 6 type of lights. Make it more cool by using the fog machine
  • Updated the Game Engine to Unity 2020.3 for better performance and graphics

    Reminder: This is a simulator game, there are no goals or achievements to complete!

data.short_description: Always dreamed to be the operator of your favorite fairground ride? This is your change to take the control! Our Polyp Simulator will let you operate the ride completely yourself in a realistic way.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64-bits, Windows 8 64-bits, Windows 7 64-bits Service Pack 1
  • Processor: Intel core i5 6400 / Other processor with the same specs
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX950 2GB GDDR5 / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard with NumPad and mouse are required.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard with NumPad and mouse are required.
